favortieNotifications.description: Favorite pros gets notifications when they start a game (Auto refresh on).
favortieNotifications.title: Favorite notifications

hardwareAcceleration.description: Hardware acceleration uses the GPU to make the ProSpec run more smoothly.
hardwareAcceleration.title: Hardware acceleration

keyboardMode.description: Enables app navigation using the keyboard.
keyboardMode.title: Keyboard mode

minimizeToTray.description: Close button should minimize, not exit.
minimizeToTray.title: Minimize to tray

randomAppBackground.description: Choose the app background to be randomly selected from champion pool, or set it to a specific default.
randomAppBackground.title: Random app background

liveBackground.description: Will use the animated version of a splash art, instead of the default image. (If possible)
liveBackground.title: Live background

refreshInterval.description: How many seconds/min to refresh the list of pros. 3m+ recommended because of LoL API rate limits.
refreshInterval.title: Refresh interval

showRandomSkins.description: Displays random skin backgrounds instead of default skin art.
showRandomSkins.title: Show random skins

showSummonerIds.description: Displays player summoner ID (Hide on bush), instead of gamertag (Faker).
showSummonerIds.title: Show summoner IDs

showTeamLogos.description: Displays team logo in place of current champion in card.
showTeamLogos.title: Show team logos

useCutouts.description: Uses transparent champion cutouts instead of loading splash art
useCutouts.title: Use cutouts

showUnavailable.description: Displays player cards that are currently unavailable for spectating. (Error in Spectator API, or player is not currently playing.)
showUnavailable.title: Show unavailable

tooltips.playerUnavailable: {{player}} is either not in a game, or spectator is unavailable.
